DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether and what extent blood pressure variability is associated with arterial stiffness and carotid atherosclerosis, furthermore to compare the difference in the relationship of the types of blood pressure variability with arterial stiffness and carotid atherosclerosis.
DOC.brief_title: The Study of Blood Pressure Variability to Impact Arterial Stiffness and Carotid Atherosclerosis
DOC.criteria: Can step by himself/herself Cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases Secondary hypertension Chronic cardiac, renal, gastrointestinal, pulmonary or any other systemic disease process requiring chronic intake of prescription medications
